text: "Never Say Die" is a 2018 song by the Scottish synth-pop band Chvrches. It is the third single from their third studio album Love Is Dead which was released in 2018. ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from Tidal. Chvrches * Martin Doherty – composition, keyboard * Iain Cook – composition, keyboard * Lauren Mayberry – composition, vocals Studio personnel * Greg Kurstin – composition, production, keyboard, drums, record engineering * Chris Gehringer – master engineering * Michael Freeman – mixing assistance * Spike Stent – mixing * Julian Burg – record engineering * Alex Pasco – record engineering ==Charts== Chart (2018) Peak position ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:Chvrches songs
title: Never Say Die (Chvrches song)
